text: Canning Bridge bus station is a Transperth bus station above Canning Bridge railway station. It is at the intersection of the Kwinana Freeway and Canning Highway in Como, Western Australia. It is served by Transperth routes operated by Path Transit, Swan Transit and Transdev WA. ==History== Canning Bridge bus station opened on 11 February 2002.Freeway bus lanes open on Monday Minister for Planning & Infrastructure 10 February 2002 The station originally provided bus services at both the upper (Canning Highway) and lower (Kwinana Freeway) platforms. Due to the construction of the Mandurah line, the lower platforms were closed on 29 January 2006 and converted for railway use. ==References== * * * ==External links== *Access map Transperth Category:Bus stations in Perth, Western Australia Category:Como, Western Australia
title: Canning Bridge bus station
